testcase.name: To validate login using different set of credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is in facebook login page........................................passed When User enter invalid username and password...............................passed And User click login button.................................................passed Then User must be in invalid credentials page...............................passed

testcase.name: To validate login without entering required credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is in facebook login page........................................passed When User click login button................................................passed Then User must be in invalid credentials page...............................passed
